text: "Dream On" is a song by Scottish recording artist Amy Macdonald. The song was released as a digital download on 6 January 2017 through Mercury Records as the lead single from her fourth studio album Under Stars (2017). The song has peaked at number 28 on the Scottish Singles Chart. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Dream On" was first released onto YouTube on 13 January 2017 at a total length of three minutes and twenty-three seconds.Amy Macdonald - Dream On on YouTube ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ==Release history== {|class=wikitable !
